Name: Golden Temple
Review Text:
Great food, music and ambience. Service is good but can take a bit time during busy hours.
A mix of tasty Indian and Asian food. Vegan and vegetarian with a flavor. Behaved dogs are allowed.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Delicious food with many nice vegan options. The personnel was very kind and polite.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: A must go for Indian food. Nice decor and sitting. Food tea worth the price( yes it‚Äôs not on the higher end). To all fellow Indians missing home food, try the north Indian thali(platter) it‚Äôs a real home food. Authentic taste and flavours.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: A wonderful place with special food, high quality and delicious! Even if you like eating meat you would not miss anything when you eat out at the Golden Temple. And it was so cosy - we went there with 2 teenagers and a kid and had a great ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Fantastic food. I ate here on the eve of my 30th birthday shortly before proposing to my fianc√©e and it was wonderful, brilliant atmosphere, delicious food, friendly staff (I spoke to the Scottish waitress (possibly owner) and she was very welcoming and affable). I will definitely visit again next time I'm in Amsterdam!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: We were not seated for 10 mins despite having a reservation. They got our order wrong. The Indian dishes we ordered were very bland and watery - nothing remotely authentic about them. The food mostly consisted of just sauce, so the meal was ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Very lovely venue. Original decoration and very comfy seats. The food was nice. Very good choice for Veg. Food :)

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Food was amazing, great service. Space inside the restaurant was quite cramped. I should have taken some effort to see something other than the top 5 pictures on Google.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Absolutely amazing experience. Wonderful staff and food, great atmosphere and great food. (I did leave on a rush so forgot to tip sorry about that.)

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text:
Great family friendly restaurant.
Only one of us is vegetarian but we all had a wonderful meal!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: The menu could use an update. Still the same from last time. However, the food is fabulous and the staff is just amazing! Thank you for the grand dinner! üòç

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: We had an Indian dish and salad. Salad was tasty and fresh, the Indian dish didn't have much flavour and was very basic, 20‚Ç¨ idnt worth the price and quality. In a proper Indian restaurant you get these small plates as a starter not as for main dish. The service was nice and place looking cozy and with a character.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Super disappointing and overpriced meal. The ambience and decor was lovely but the food really didn't match up. As someone who has tried a lot of authentic Indian food, the 'Flavours of India' was just really watery and the portions were ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: As with some other reviewers here, I'm a bit puzzled by the high ratings. The food is OK - a bit lacking in punch, but healthy at least. Prices should be about half what they are though. That said, the decor and ambience is nice.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Really Nice food! The Pizza was a nice dish, and the orange juice is really nice, the Green Enchilada was really nice mexican food too :)

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Friendly service and comfort food. The advocado nori tempura is a must and the blue corn tortilla with pulled jackfruit delish (photo). We will comeback for sure to try the long menu options the restaurant offers.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text:
They serve Vegan food!
The food was absolutely amazing. I was really impressed with how delicious it was. ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: This meal was hauntingly ensaddening. Not sure why it gets 4 and 5 star ratings, maybe the vegetarian population of Amsterdam applaud crimes against food. ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Amazing place. The menu is amazing and staff super nice.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Absolutely stunning. Best food I've had in Amsterdam. South Asian/ Indian cities, tempeh, amazing salad, creative imaginative dishes, about ‚Ç¨18 for a main. Beautiful place. Comfy and magical

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: I really enjoyed my meal here. The staff were very friendly and the vegan options were quite varied. Thanks for a lovely evening.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text:
it was the best food i had until now in Amsterdam. It was so good and the people are really friendly. The restaurant is pretty and there is a nice atmosphere.
I hightly recommend it!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text:
Great experience in a suggestive location.
Staff is super friendly.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: The staff is really lovely. The interior is like another world apart from the street of Amsterdam. You get i  the proper mood for the food. The restaurant have a wide variety of food and many vegan options. Ordered appetizers only, all of them delicious.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: This place deserves a much better rating than it currently has (4.4 at the time of writing this review). Amazing food, good service, good music, extremely confortable tables upstairs!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Very good food. New guy forgot the glasses, and we were missing our mango chutneys, but other than that, very good. ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Big brave flavors of Mexico, south and east asia, and yes Italy, delivered inexpensively with fortitude. By which I mean there is very little meat mimicry. Shout outs for the Pizza the Tofu Tikka Masala, the Avocado Tempura and the tacos. Why the missing star? The Cheesecake was forgettable.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Nice small place with friendly staff! Had a mix of curries and a pizza which all tasted very nice!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Nice and relaxed vibe. Service is exquisit and the food is varying and very much vegan friendly. ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Absolutely superb vegetarian cuisine! Attentive service in an eclectic, Indonesian atmosphere. Wonderful experience.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: This restaurant was a huge surprise, first because we were lucky enough to get a table on a Saturday night without a reservation (if you can, don't do that). The waitress was very lovely and attentive. The food was simply delicious. I had ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text:
My carnivorous husband suggested that I write a review for this restaurant.

On my birthday I get to eat vegetarian/vegan, but here's the twist: I also have ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Delicious food, great menu, recommend the taste of India dish. Ask to sit upstairs for best time

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Very good food and friendly staff! We went with 6 people an 2 dogs and they were very accommodating to seat us in the upstairs terrace. All the vegetarian options were great!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: The food is good, but nothing special. The service was quick in the beginning: we were served our drinks and got our menus. After we got our food it was like they forgot about us. We really wanted to get some dessert, but after waiting for ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Delicious food. Book ahead as it gets very busy here. It's good to know they have regular cheese if you want it... You don't have to go totally vegan.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: The atmosphere looked really nice from the outside but we got seated at an end table in the back, with little space. The dishes looked amazing on the plate but unfortunately the meal of the day tasted mediocre. I'll try another time.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text:
Super friendly service and amazing food!

We were upstairs - it looked and was very cosy. ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Fenomenal service, fenomenal food and just all around great vibes. Even if you're not vegan or vegetarian, Golden Temple is a must visit if you love great food!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: We ended up having a pizza because the traditional dishes were so overpriced. The pizza was good as were the spring rolls but they cost way more than they should have. Pro-tip: reserve the lounge table ahead of time. They do not take discover

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: If you want good, healthy and fresh vegan or vegetarian food this is the place to get it. Great atmosphere and staff, only downside is the price but hey, it's Amsterdam!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: I enjoyed the food and atmosphere at the Golden temple. I went for an indian classic that was full of flavour and indian spices though you can get a pizza there too. Nice decoration. ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Wonderful vegan and gluten free options - excellent service too. Boho style interior - relaxed and great atmosphere. Also there is a small little roof terrace.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: One of the best dishes I had in time. If you are a vegetarian food lover this is a must.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Amazing, healthy food and great, very friendly staff. Highly recommended!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: I've never left a bad review in my life but yesterday's meal was amazingly disappointing and overpriced I had to say something. My friend and me were excited to try this alleged 5 star-vegetarian-restaurant out, what we got was a selection ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Though I am an hardcore non vegetarian,  I simply relished the vegetarian fare served,  would definitely recommend this for anyone visiting Amsterdam

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text:
Good service,
Good food (beside Indian also some Mexican and Italian flavors on the menu),
Lovely interior!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: We had a special occasion so we ordered some food. I missed the lovely restaurant atmosphere, however the food was great and substantial. I wouldn't call it traditional indian, it has more of a western twist. Great nevertheless! Ive never ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text:
Great food! Even a non-vegetarian would love it!
Nice and cozy, informal atmosphere.
And last, but not least, a very friendly staff. ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Pretty good food. Especially enjoyed the selection of raw cheesecakes and the vegan curry.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Great food, staff and the environment was also wonderful.  Thanks for a great night!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Its great to have so many vegan options. Very friendly and helpful staff, our North Indian Thali was very tasty, great flavours, not spicy though. There are also  a few "low-sit lounge couches", that give the place extra cosiness. for our ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Food was delicious and beautiful! Service amazing as well!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Discovered this place quite by chance and visited several times since. Looks amazing on the outside, gorgeous on the outside. Wonderfully varied menu with great set options. Cannot fault the food, excellent. Staff were pleasant and ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text:
I really liked it there. The food is so amazingly good and the ambiente is also stunning. You see and taste that averything is done with love at this space.
Great menu as well. Can't decide what to eat because it all sounds delicious. Healthy, natural vegetarian/ vegan food - just perfect!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Great atmosphere and food! My recommendation is you get the thali (can be made vegan, no paneer). If youre a bigger group you should also try to reserve the big table next to the street ;)

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Great place, good food and nice people!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: The Golden Temple is amazing! The restaurant is beautifully decorated and the food is out of this world - eating here is a must if you're in Amsterdam. The menu has a great variety of dishes, so there is definitely something for everybody here. I absolutely love the Golden Temple and I hope to visit again  soon!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: The service staff was great and the place is very quirky and nice. The food left something to be desired.. as an Indian I found the Indian food a little lacking in flavor and texture. The pizzas were very good though.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: It was really delicious!!! Very good, also the atmosphere!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Great food, great people, great restaurant, absolutely amazing.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text:
One of the best vegetarian restaurants I have been to.
I would just go there for late night desserts, totally worth it.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Normally I refrain from leaving negative reviews on vegetarian restaurants as I don't want to discourage anyone from eating at these restaurants. However, the abysmal service and treatment we got at this restaurant was unbelievable. We made ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: After waiting at entrance for a few awkward minutes the waitress eventually told us that we could have a table if we finish within an hour. ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: This is one of the best restaurants in the city. A very diverse vegan menu with delicious deserts. I have eaten here plenty of times and tried out multiple dishes and have never left unsatisfied. The staff is very nice and friendly. They always go out of their way to make the customers happy! Overall an amazing restaurant.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Very nice staff! We felt very welcome. And lucky to find a table on Friday evening! Atmosphere is perfect - cozy and relaxing. Personally I always prefer cooking at home  than eating out because I am very picky vegan but in Golden Temple I ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: One of the best restaurants I have ever eaten in ‚úåÔ∏è

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Great place! Amazing food. Very nice personal, beautiful interior.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Delicious food and excellent service! Special dishes with many flavours from different parts of the world. The staff is welcoming and kind, service was quick and the atmosphere very cosy.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: The food was delightful, I enjoyed a lot, it could be a bigger serving though

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Honestly, I loved everything about this place except for the service. Waitress never came around, we were always having to call her over. Then, after telling us that we could share a plate between two for the price of one she charged us ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Quirky restaurant. Mostly vegan menu. My drink was not upto the mark.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Suuuper delicious food, cozy interior and very friendly stuff.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Truely disappointing. Visiting Amsterdam for two days for our anniversary and we were excited to try some delicious vegan finds. While the menu is 90% vegan and the decor is lovely, the service and food quality was lacking. Took border an ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: This is easily one of the Top 3 best vegetarian restaurants in Amsterdam. The Tofu Tikka Masala, the Tacos, and the mixed appetizer plate are SO SO YUMMY ! Food is fresh, consciously prepared and served, and the ambience and music is so ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: I think if you are expecting spicy, flavoursome Indian food, then this isn't the place for it. I'm an Aussie from a Pakistani ethnic background, used to very rich flavours. The Indian Thali tasted like water. The Enchiladas which my hubby had were good so I ate his food. That was good!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: A pure vegetarian Indian restaurant in Amsterdam was a reason enough for me to cheer. But, there was more! It is a cosy (not luxurious) restaurant with great food. White we sat on simple wooden table for four, right on the entry is a ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: A great expirience. We started with the rice papers which where great with a tasty dip. Then we ate the main of the many small dishes with the chapati. It was very tasty but spicy. And for a desert we ate the lime pie which was so good!!! ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Excellent food, very pleasant atmosphere. Would wholeheartedly recommend !

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Coming from an Indian background I know about the taste of Indian cuisine, so the review is purely based on authenticity of taste. The Tofu Tikka Masala that I had ordered for mains had a lot to be desired. The presentations were pretty decent, but can't say the same for taste.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Lovely food. Great space. Great service. The Taste of India dish was inspiring. The tempeh peanut salad was extraordinaire with such a variety of vegetables and flavours. Yum. The desserts were the perfect end to a perfect dinner. Has to wait quite a bit for the mains, but it was worth the wait.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: An amazing gem on the east side of the Central Canal District. Incredible Indian dishes with excellent depth of flavor all prepared with close attention to the details of vegetarian and vegan. Most dishes were vegan and others could be made so. Very friendly staff. The place gets busy and crowded but it is SO worth it!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: The nachos and enchiladas were amazing.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: We went there a group of 30 persons. I could book the place only two days ahead. The food is great, the staff is the most friendly and nice I've seen. With a group of 30 people that was hard to manage but they did it perfectly. Smiling and ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Amazing restaurant! We went there for the first time and we immediately fell in love with the food ! There are a lot of gluten free choices, and the products are fresh and well prepared. The staff is really friendly and the price is fair. We will be back again, for sure!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text:
We visited the restaurant for the second Time . The food ist delicios and beautiful presented. The staf is Kind of relaxed and frindly.
The Portion was ok, should not be smaller. ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Ordered overpriced Indian, got mediocre Mexican priced ‚Ç¨10 cheaper. Wouldn't pick up the phone either.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Without a doubt the tastiest tofu curry I've had the pleasure of consuming in quite a while. Along with a starter of fried avocado, with a very tasty dip by the way, and a glass or two of bio/organic merlot, everything served by very ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: very good vegeterain and gluten free food

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Amsterdam is plenty of eastern ad Indian Restaurants. I knew them well, since 1995.  But i never found a place with this enchanted mood, and this good vibes. the food is delicious, Lekker, like they say in A'dam, spicy but delicate, and so ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Rather pretentious restaurant that suffers from a bit of an identity crisis. Tries to mix Indian and eastern decor with a mix of vegetarian food from all over the world and fails in this regard. ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Unique vegetarian restaurant in the centre of Amsterdam. Very reasonably priced, friendly Dutch speaking staff and delicious food. Seems a popular place, thus busy, so might be smart to make reservations. Beware, the flatbread has lots and lots of garlic, but tastes delicious.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Loving it and I am not vegetarian! Good food, good service and great ambiance upstairs.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: The food is delicious, and there are loads of options. The menu seems eclectic, but you have to understand they've kept the theme of being Amsterdam's first vegetarian restaurant 47 years and running. ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Delicious food and drinks! Lots of vegan options, even for dessert! The only downside was that we had to wait a while for the waitress to notice us while everyone around is had all their food and were even finished. Still had a great time and will come back again soon!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Contact (around reservation and Corona) before was already very sweet, waiters were super nice. Food was amazing.  And loved the setting! Thank you!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: My friend and I came here after tiring of meat heavy dutch food. We treated ourselves to vegetable pakora and spring rolls ( south asian style) and then the Indian banquet (chapatti with various stews such as daal, chickpea curry, saag ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Super tasty food. Its a bit small and was fully booked but we got a nice table within 15 minutes. The menu we had to ask for but once we oredered food it came within 5 minutes and it was superb. Would love to eat this food again.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: The atmosphere is pretty good and the General appearance of the restauraunt looks realy nice but the price for the akward and disgusting tasting Food was ridiculous ( at least 18‚Ç¨ per dish ) We expected way more than that what we actually ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: We ended up eating here twice on our recent visit to Amsterdam. We had really tasty, fresh food both times. Not too expensive, easy to get to as the no 4 tram stops almost right outside.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: The Golden Temple offers an excellent selection of vegetarian dishes with some gluten free options. The service was friendly and efficient; the food was excellent and the check was reasonable. We would definitely return.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Service was good but food was just OK, and a bit pricy.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Do not be mislead by the name! Be mislead by the name! And that describes Golden Temple the best. Inspired by the Indian Sick temple, the restaurant radiates positivity, health and beauty (at a deeper level). And this is where all the ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Ate there last night. Sometimes it can be difficult to find places to eat in the Netherlands as a vegan. Everything on the menu is vegetarian and about 80% vegan. Artsy and peaceful atmosphere, friendly staff and absolutely delicious food. Will be returning again!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Cozy and semi-romantic. (it was crowded and a tad noisy). I had the curry of the day and it was yummy. They have a few Mexican food items as well.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Good vegan and vegetarian eurasian food. Not that cheap.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: I have dined here a few times and the food has always been good , unfortunately i ate here two days ago and i had pumpkin soup it arrived cold when i complained they just took it away and microwaved it ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Very delicious vegetarian and vegan food! Cozy atmosphere and very kind and fast service!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Had such a wonderful evening at this restaurant. A very interesting range of food, definitely worth the price, staff were also completely lovely, will definitely be returning if we come back to Amsterdam

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Menu was a little odd - quite varying cuisines mixed in. I get that they wan't to be able to have many guests at a time but the tables were a bit too close together. The food was delicious though.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: This restaurant is lovely. Brilliant vegan choices and very moreish food. The only let down was that the service was quite slow so I wouldn't recommend going if you're in a hurry!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: The food was off the chain!! Very healthy and you could taste the delic veggies. Great ambience. .chill music and cute interior design. Highly recommend the 'nutty goat' pizza and 'Turkish quinoa' ...amazing

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: My wife and I had some wonderful vegetarian food here.  I had a southeast Asian coconut curry, she had a "traditional Mexican" dish with spicy black beans.  Both were great.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Worst restaurant experience of my life. Entire dinner party fel ill from the food. Called restaurant - they told us it 'couldn't have been them' and 'at least you're now no longer ill'. ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: We ordered the South East Asia curry for delivery. The curry was ‚Ç¨21 and listed as a ‚ÄòBig Main‚Äô The portion size was very small, the taste was nice but nothing special to justify the price of this dish.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Some of the best chai I've ever had. I had the thali and each dish was distinctly flavoured and the meal was sufficiently portioned and filling. Was worth the price and would absolutely recommend.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text:
Nice food, but they are not generous with spices -- mexican was not spicy AT ALL, the same with the curry dish and quinoa risotto could need some salt and pepper. Tiny, and I mean TINY, portions.
20 euro for at dish that leaves you hungry is too much

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Super friendly staff and cozy atmosphere, the food here is fresh, delicious and very filling. Great vegan, gluten free and soy free options. Try the trio of pies and the tacos!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Food was creative in presentation and ingredients but not put well together I'm terms of taste. Very pricey for their tiny portion sizes

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: The food was fantastic and the service was great too. The restaurant got really busy later on in the night so you should probably go early if possible

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Their raw chocolate cake is A M A Z I N G. A must try. Their customer service is excellent as well! Very friendly. I just wouldn't mind a slightly bigger portion.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Food here is simply mind-blowing. This place   has a lot of vegan, vegetarian and gluten-free options. The only bad side is that there's no Air Conditioning, and so the place was a little too hot. The staff is very friendly, and they solved the problem by giving us their own hand fans.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: I recommend everyone to come here, the service is excellent, the dishes are delicious, the presentation is beautiful

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Soup of the day- pumpkin soup was great. Nice vegan place. The Thali looked delicious but we din't have it. Pakoras could have been better.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Authentic Turkish cuisine. Really like and hope you guys keep up the quality standards. ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Amazing vegan options. Indian Thali is so good and tasty. Perfect option for healthy food üåª

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Delicious food and fast and friendly service! I'd recommend the flavours of India dish, as it truly brought me back to India..

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text:
Great food, however at steep prices.
We had to wait quite long to order our food and similarly long for it to arrive. ‚Ä¶

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Great food, so much vegan options. Would have been five stars if the menu would offer some more surprising dishes.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Best vegetarian Restaurant ever. This is my new favorite Restaurant when in town. Well done guys!!! Highly recommended for veggies and vegans. Super duper.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Eclectic and tasty vegetarian dishes. Many vegan options too. Friendly staff and fast service. Would recommend to reserve.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: They managed to squeeze us in on a busy Saturday night. The service was very friendly and the food was excellent. Thoroughly enjoyed it.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Good food and atmosphere! Lately the portion size has improved, before they were to small for me (being a big eater).

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Loved this place. Great food for a decent price and very accommodating people working there. Comfy, interestingly decorated and variedly musicated.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Overpriced and small portions lacking in flavor. The presentation of the food was beautiful, and the service was good.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Nice food,it was OK.. but not really Indian..so just an OK vegan food but I wouldn't necessarily go back.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: So tasty and fresh. But pricey. I chew the fresh food slowly, so I get the feeling that I'm full in the end. Beautiful paintings on the walls...

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Great service! The food is varied and delicious. It's a bit overpriced, but what do you expect in the center of Amsterdam..

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: So fresh and tasty. Vegetarian restaurant with an Indian/Asian menu.  I loved the kitcheree - reminded me of the one my mom makes.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: I think this is one of the best restaurants I ate in! Golden Temple is also an example of how vegan food can be extremely delicious! Very nice staff as well!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Such an awesome atmosphere and plenty of vegan options that are tasty and well presented. Staff are friendly and accommodating.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Steep prices, small portions. Bland food. The service was also incredibly slow and they repeatedly forgot our drink orders. Very disappointed

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Delicious food, fast and friendly service, very pleasant atmosphere! Highly recommendüòã‚ò∫Ô∏è

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Excellent vegan & vegetarian food, right from the main course to the dessert. Good and unique choices and nice decor.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: One of the absolute Best meals I‚Äôve had in Amsterdam. The service was amazing the food was spectacular and the ambience was awesome.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Delicious and cozy

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Very friendly and relaxed atmosphere. Food was great, nice varied selection. Raw desert was amazing.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Delicious vegetarian Indian meal. Quick and friendly service but got busy quickly so recommend booking.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Great and friendly service, food very very good. Recommended

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Loved it, as an Indian myself and vegan too if I say it is good, then trust me it really is good. Fair pricing too for an expensive city!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Pretty good food. Great vegetarian, vegan, and gluten free choices. They even have vegan ice cream!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text:
Taste is good. Very poor ambience and slightly expensive.

Desserts are bad. Starters and main dish is worth a try

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Lovely restaurant upstairs is the best area . Good was so tasty and hot. Friendly staff.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Had some really nice dinners here. Relaxed atmosphere, truly delicious food, beautiful paintings, kind people. I'll be back!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Authentic and great tasting. Highly recommended.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: One of my favorites! Cozy place, good food and good folks!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Amazing Indian food. So much flavour. Nice staff. Thanks everyone!!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: I thought the price was really steep for the portion size but the appetizers tasted good and the main dish taste good.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: It's a good place to have some Indian food. They also serve Italian and Mexican food. They specialize in vegan food.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: The food is good, especially the khichdi! Service is a little slow and the food is definitely too pricey.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Tasty food, fast and excellent service... But expensive and small portions. Left the place hungry

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text:
Nice atmosphere, great food.
Good job guys.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Good food. Better to book a table on advance  if you want to have dinner on Friday

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: If your in Amsterdam definitely worth a visit. Good food good service and a great vibe man.  After all this is Amsterdam!!!!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Golden experience. This place is a fest for the eyes, amazing hand painted walls. The food is delicious

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Very good food. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten free. Not cheap

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Very good Indian vegetarian restaurant, it's a nice and cosy place to relax and maybe wait out the rain if it hits you üòé

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Really tasty food and big portions. We loved it!

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Best restaurant I tried in Amsterdam, lots of vegan options. Nice decor, good vibes.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Appears to be in fashion. Therefore expect to wait when you haven't reserved a table. Food is good but maybe a little bit over priced.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: Great food! Mexican, pizza, appetizers, all delicious and fulfilling. Friendly staff too.

Name: Golden Temple
Review Text: delicious vegetarian food, lovely decor and great serviceüå∏

Name: Golden Temple
